name: Uyuni
skill: Deals 3797/4367 DMG to current target. Target deals 30%/37 less DMG for a limited time.
ability: Moderately increases skill DMG by all melee allies.

additional_data.description: A spirit who uses a huge mirror to reflect the sky. She can create a mirror anywhere using her purified salt and water. She uses the mirror to conceal herself while practicing sexy poses. Rain makes her more motivated and focused, apparently because she's on the good side of all the rain gods of the worlds. She boasts that her poses are so sexy that they can stop any man—or god—in his tracks.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ Limited Jewel Summon 22/03/17- 12/04/17
◦ Trade at Exchange for 50 Mochi 09/04/17 - 12/04/17
additional_data.notes_and_trivia:
◦ Increases the Skill DMG of all allies by 33% during the "Chopping Trees? Stop, Please!" event.
◦ The effect increases with the number of limit breaks. (33% → 49.75% → 66.5% → 83.25% → 100%)
◦ Summon rate increased until 22/03/17- 12/04/17
◦ She was originally introduced as an Anima but was later changed to a Divina.

skill: "Even sunlight can become a weapon when it's focused enough."
